response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only embodies innovation but also promises unparalleled performance and durability. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $12,000. This opportunity is tailored specifically for you, recognizing your discerning taste and appreciation for premium products. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 12000}
